name: Addagrip Surface Treatments UK Ltd
description: Addagrip, based in Uckfield, East Sussex and founded in 1980, is a leading producer of resin bound surfacing products, with brands such as Addastone and Addaset. Addagrip sells a range of high quality external surfacing, internal flooring, industrial flooring as well as the Addagrip 1000 System airfield pavement concrete protection system.
address:
